product information:
The 21.3-inch NEC MultiSync LCD2190UXP, offering about 30 great features is a versatile monitor that also brings you the smart Ambix3 Technology. Ambix3 Technology empowers this NEC MultiSync monitor to be connected simultaneously to 3 input sources. This NEC LCD monitor offers a resolution of 1600 x 1200 and a response time of 16 ms. The 1000:1 contrast ratio on NEC MultiSync LCD2190UXP offers great blacks and whites while the really wide 178Â° horizontal and vertical viewing angles offer comfortable viewing. AccuColor Control System on this NEC MultiSync monitor allows for color adjustments and On-Screen Manager controls let you access easy-to-use options to make adjustments for onscreen visuals. The intelligent AmbiBright Technology on this NEC LCD monitor automatically adjusts the backlight sensing the lighting levels of the room. NEC MultiSync LCD2190UXP also employs the Intelligent Power Manager System to help you save costs and conserve resources.
